document_data.name: Nymessa
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nymessa''' was a [[tiefling]] archer who lived in [[Elturel]] and later on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|And be careful. There are goblin traps everywhere.}}
document_data.Description: Nymessa had red skin and dark hair.
document_data.Possessions: She wore a suit of elaborate [[leather armor]] and armed herself with a [[bow]] and [[arrow]]s.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Nymessa and all the other tieflings within were exiled from Elturel following [[the Descent|the city's brief descent]] into the [[Nine Hells]]. The refugees came under the leadership of the exiled [[Hellrider]] known as [[Zevlor]]. The group traveled west towards the sprawling metropolis of [[Baldur's Gate]], and eventually took refuge at the [[Emerald Grove]] after [[goblin]] bands harried their march along the road.

After settling into the Emerald Grove the [[githyanki]] known as [[Lae'zel]] stumbled into a trap just outside the sanctuary's walls, and was soon discovered by Nymessa and her companion [[Damays]]. Nymessa exclaimed that the "thing" was dangerous, and that they should just let [[goblin]]s come and kill her. Damays believed that it might be possible for Lae'zel to escape.
